entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
